AMQP

Class Service

  • java.lang.Object
    • AMQP.Service

  • public class Service
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Fabian Hempel Class that contains a service and let it get and receive data.

      • subscribe

        public java.lang.String subscribe(java.lang.String devUsrSvr)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Subscribe to a device data. If the subscription was successfull, build a new queue where the published messages are received.
        Parameters:
        devUsrSvr - target device, has to be in format "devicename#dataindex@targetserver".
        Returns:
        String with the success of the subscription.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • unsubscribe

        public java.lang.String unsubscribe(java.lang.String devUsrSvr)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Unsubscribe device data.
        Parameters:
        devUsrSvr - target device, has to be in format "devicename#dataindex@targetserver".
        Returns:
        String with the success of the unsubscription.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getDeviceData

        public java.lang.String getDeviceData(java.lang.String device)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Request the data of a device.
        Parameters:
        device - target device, has to be in format "devicename#dataindex@targetserver".
        Returns:
        String with the response.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
